title: List of songs recorded by Miley Cyrus
summary: American singer Miley Cyrus has recorded songs for seven studio albums, four soundtrack albums, and guest features. She first came to prominence within the entertainment industry for her portrayal of Hannah Montana in the television series of the same name, which premiered in March 2006.[1] Cyrus is credited as Hannah Montana for eight of the thirteen tracks featured on its first soundtrack album Hannah Montana, which was released in October 2006.[2] Matthew Gerrard was responsible for much of its songwriting and production,[3] and tended towards a "sugary sweet" sound.[4]
